price: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi bila ya shaka ndiye Yeye Mwenye nguvu Mwenye kurehemu.
footnotes: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi hapana shaka ndiye Yeye aliye tengeka kwa Nguvu na Ushindi, Mwenye kuwaneemesha Waumini kwa rehema nyingi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
